p:
Late 2019, a novel coronavirus causing coronavirus disease (COVID-19) emerged in Wuhan, China, and rapidly spread globally.
1 Iran reported the first confirmed cases of COVID-19 on 19 February 2020 in Qom
2 which is located about 150 km to the south of Tehran. The outbreak then quickly moved to other parts of Iran. The aim of this study was to describe the epidemic curve and estimate the reproduction number of COVID-19 in Iran. For this purpose, the SIR (Susceptible–Infected–Removed)
3 epidemic model was used to fit the reported data.
